events: Orphaned at age two due to a cholera epidemic
Studied at the San Carlos Academy of Fine Arts in Valencia
Received a grant to study in Rome
In Valencia, married Clotilde García del Castillo
Won Grand Prix of the Paris Universal Exposition
Recognized as one of the greatest living artists in Europe
Bought a house in Madrid which included a large studio
Painted portraits of King Alfonso XIII and other high-profile Spaniard figures
Suffered a stroke that left him partially paralyzed
